title: 大家一齊向新加坡高呼釋放政治犯華記正撚樣 !!

replies.msg:
https://www.police.gov.sg/iwitness

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to provide evidence to support an ongoing investigation of a crime that was suspected to be committed inside Singapore by a Hong Kong resident Mr. Yeung(楊官華).

Contrary to what Mr. Yeung's self explanation that he is not planning to carry out any public assembly in Singapore to publicly discuss politics regarding PRC and Hong Kong SAR, there is clear evidences on the internet that shows his intention to spread his political view in Singapore(Links attached below).


As a active internet users, I have strong reasons to believe his sole purpose for travelling to Singapore is to attend this meeting , as he has a very strong political view on China and Hong Kong politics according to both his youtube channel(Links attached below) which is also a clear evidence against his claim of not being involved in political discussions. A majority of his subscribers are also very political active.

I think it is only fair and justice that the investigation of his case to not be misleaded and to have proper and sufficient evidence for the truth to be revealed.

https://www.police.gov.sg/iwitness

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to support an ongoing investigation of an illegal public assembly organized by a Hong Kong resident Mr. Yeung(楊官華) in Singapore.

Contrary to what Mr. Yeung's self explanation of he was not planning to carry out any political gathering in Singapore to publicly discuss politics regarding PRC and Hong Kong SAR, there is clear evidences show his diabolical intention to rally up Singaporeans’ support on a particular political standing in Singapore.


As a person who has taken interests in learning about social issues, I closely follow in most things that Mr. Yeung has published to the public’s eyes. His social media is of cruel intentions to upsetting the public. He has always been vocal about his personal admirations to China’s politics and her unyielding toughness to the reign of Hong Kong, regardless the means to do so. He even applauded the reign of terror by China disregarding the rule of law over the City. A person like that, who also acquires an ability to influence people’s thoughts, is a political threat to any places that respect the importance of the rule of law.

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to support an ongoing investigation of an illegal public assembly organized by a Hong Kong resident Mr. Yeung(楊官華) in Singapore.

Contrary to what Mr. Yeung's self explanation of he was not planning to carry out any political gathering in Singapore to publicly discuss politics regarding PRC and Hong Kong SAR, there is clear evidences show his diabolical intention to rally up Singaporeans’ support on a particular political standing in Singapore.


As a person who has taken interests in learning about social issues, I closely follow in most things that Mr. Yeung has published to the public’s eyes. His social media is of cruel intentions to upsetting the public. He has always been vocal about his personal admirations to China’s politics and her unyielding toughness to the reign of Hong Kong, regardless the means to do so. He even applauded the reign of terror by China disregarding the rule of law over the City. A person like that, who also acquires an ability to influence people’s thoughts, is a political threat to any places that respect the importance of the rule of law.

replies.msg:
Nonetheless, the majority of subscribers to his social media accounts is politically active. His social media platform is affiliated with horrid political comments by his supporters, indicting that Mr. Yeung’s ability and enthusiasms in gathering people to be involved in political movements voluntarily. To support my point, i will suggest watching his works, including his youtube channel (Links attached below) and his works summarize his personality as a hostile politics figure who pries on people’s emotions and vulnerabilities. He articulates to be a influential political personality from the beginning. Therefore, every move made by him is a political move. Those reasons concern Yeung’s visit to the country as it is highly suspected to be with an ill intention to destabilizing your country’s harmony through political tribalism from the within, and to jeopardizing the relations with other sovereignties. It is entirely plausible that Yeung has an agenda for going to Singapore was to assemble the meetings and convince the attendees to follow and act in a similar political fashion as him. As it is likely that he does, he violates the a law under the Public Order Act, of which he does not obtain a police permit to a public assembly.

I sincerely appreciate a just consequence to Mr. Yeung’s violations on your land and showcase that the rule of law shall be respected by people.

quote.msg:
https://www.police.gov.sg/iwitness

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to support an ongoing investigation of an illegal public assembly organized by a Hong Kong resident Mr. Yeung(楊官華) in Singapore.

Contrary to what Mr. Yeung's self explanation of he was not planning to carry out any political gathering in Singapore to publicly discuss politics regarding PRC and Hong Kong SAR, there is clear evidences show his diabolical intention to rally up Singaporeans’ support on a particular political standing in Singapore.


As a person who has taken interests in learning about social issues, I closely follow in most things that Mr. Yeung has published to the public’s eyes. His social media is of cruel intentions to upsetting the public. He has always been vocal about his personal admirations to China’s politics and her unyielding toughness to the reign of Hong Kong, regardless the means to do so. He even applauded the reign of terror by China disregarding the rule of law over the City. A person like that, who also acquires an ability to influence people’s thoughts, is a political threat to any places that respect the importance of the rule of law.

Nonetheless, the majority of subscribers to his social media accounts is politically active. His social media platform is affiliated with horrid political comments by his supporters, indicting that Mr. Yeung’s ability and enthusiasms in gathering people to be involved in political movements voluntarily. To support my point, i will suggest watching his works, including his youtube channel (Links attached below) and his works summarize his personality as a hostile politics figure who pries on people’s emotions and vulnerabilities. He articulates to be a influential political personality from the beginning. Therefore, every move made by him is a political move. Those reasons concern Yeung’s visit to the country as it is highly suspected to be with an ill intention to destabilizing your country’s harmony through political tribalism from the within, and to jeopardizing the relations with other sovereignties. It is entirely plausible that Yeung has an agenda for going to Singapore was to assemble the meetings and convince the attendees to follow and act in a similar political fashion as him. As it is likely that he does, he violates the a law under the Public Order Act, of which he does not obtain a police permit to a public assembly.

I sincerely appreciate a just consequence to Mr. Yeung’s violations on your land and showcase that the rule of law shall be respected by people.
